participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.background: I go hiking in the mountains to clear my head and get some exercise. I have a personal trainer. I enjoy reading Jane Austen novels and talking to my mother about her life in Saudi Arabia. I'm worried about not being able to keep any food down and losing too much weight. I am a good listener and always there for my friends and family.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Creative, easygoing, and passionate about pop culture.
participant_2.background: I wore my favorite color sneakers to Comic Con and had a great time! After a long day at work, my favorite way to unwind is to watch anime and superhero shows. I start an internship in engineering later this year. I and my mom like to listen to the Beatles together. I spend my evening creating the perfect music playlist.

content.text: Hi there, I'm currently at the comic con with my friends!
Hi! That sounds fun, I wore my favorite color sneakers to comic con and had a great time!
Thanks, what kind of sneakers are they?
They are bright red and they have a picture of the Joker on them.
Awesome! I love comic con, it's so much fun to dress up as your favorite character.
I know right? I love seeing all the different cosplays!
Do you have any favorite superhero shows or anime?
I love watching superhero shows, my favorite is My Hero Academia.
Oh I love that show too! It's so good!
I know right? I'm so excited for season 5.
Me too! I'm also excited for my internship in engineering later this year.
That's awesome! What kind of engineering will you be doing?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm excited to find out.
I'm sure you'll do great! You seem like a smart person.
No problem! Have a great time at comic con!
